title: How to Use Social Media, According to Teen Girls
description: Parents and public health experts have a lot to say about what adolescent girls do on their phones. We asked teens to weigh in.

title: Google’s Bard Just Got More Powerful. It’s Still Erratic.
description: The chatbot now pulls information from a user’s Gmail, Google Docs and Google Drive accounts. The feature leaves a lot to be desired.

title: Space-Based Solar Power Is a Possible Alternative Energy Source
description: Space-based solar power, once a topic for science fiction, is gaining interest.

title: ChatGPT Can Now Generate Images, Too
description: OpenAI released a new version of its DALL-E image generator to a small group of testers and incorporated the technology into its popular ChatGPT chatbot.

title: Google Says Switching Away From Its Search Engine Is Easy. It’s Not.
description: Google says a change takes just a few steps, but a panel of designers found otherwise. The issue is at the heart of a federal antitrust trial.

title: Franzen, Grisham and Other Prominent Authors Sue OpenAI
description: The suit, filed with the Authors Guild, accuses the A.I. company of infringing on authors’ copyrights, claiming it used their books to train its ChatGPT chatbot.
